page.title: Sentry Integration
page.description: Test Sentry error tracking for your Next.js app

hero.title: sentry-example-page
hero.description: Click the button below, and view the sample error on the Sentry Issues Page. For more details about setting up Sentry, read our docs.

connectivity.title: Connectivity Error
connectivity.description: It looks like network requests to Sentry are being blocked, which will prevent errors from being captured. Try disabling your ad-blocker to complete the test.

error.title: SentryExampleFrontendError
error.description: This error is raised on the frontend of the example page.

meta.title: sentry-example-page
meta.description: Test Sentry for your Next.js app!
